Question
========

Given is the table for two dichotomous variables

  ----------- ----- ------- man woman glasses 40 15 no glasses 35 20 ----------- ----- -------

What is the ᵪ^2^ value of this data for the test of independence?

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.337.
* ᵪ2 = 0.623.
* ᵪ2 = 6.251.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.337.: Correct
* ᵪ2 = 0.623.: Incorrect
* ᵪ2 = 6.251.: Incorrect
